text: Uhi ho jasale akasaharu ra prthvila'i chah (6) dinama srsti garyo ani sinhasanamathi ucca bhayo. U jandacha je jati dharatima pravesa gardacha ra je–jati usabata niskancha, ra je–jati akasabata avatarita huncha ra je–jati usama cadhdacha. Ra timi jahamsukai bha'e pani u timro sathama cha ra allaha dekhdacha, je–jati timile gardachau
